# Subagent: gameplay-agent

## Scope
Owns game model/state logic and gameplay correctness.

## Owns
- `Dictive/DictiveGame.swift`
- `Tests/TapGameSmokeTests.swift`

## Definition of done
- Palette/match/score/streak/progress/new-board behavior is preserved or intentionally changed with explanation.
- `scripts/test.sh` passes.
